name: Stevens et ux. v. Pittsburgh, Appellant

judges: Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
parties: Stevens et ux. v. Pittsburgh, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
' The decree of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Cunningham.
Appellant is directed to pay the costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Anne X. Alpern, First Assistant City Solicitor, with her Churchill Mehard, City Solicitor, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Stevens et ux. v. Pittsburgh, Appellant.
Argued March 28, 1938.
Before Kephart, C. J., Schaefer, Maxey, Drew, Linn, Stern and Barnes, JJ.
Anne X. Alpern, First Assistant City Solicitor, with her Churchill Mehard, City Solicitor, for appellant.
A. 3. Rosenberg, for appellee.
April 18, 1938:
